abstract.t: This document describes a mechanism for networks with legacy IPv4-only clients to use services provided by DHCPv4-over-DHCPv6 in a Relay Agent. RFC7341 specifies use of DHCPv4-over-DHCPv6 in the client only. This document specifies a RFC7341-based approach that allows a Relay Agent to implement the DHCP 4o6 encapsulation and decapsulation of DHCPv4 messages in DHCPv6 messages on behalf of a DHCPv4 client.
